page.title: 14Norley Brownies
page.content: The 2nd Norley Brownies is held from 18.00 to 19.00 hrs. every Wednesday at Norley Primary School. There are about 21 girls in the pack aged 8 to 10 years. We have a Brown Owl and a Snowy Owl. we have 3 sixes which are Kelpies, Sprites and Gnomes, and there are about 6 girls in each six. We wear a brown dress and hat. We make a promise "I promise that I will do my best to do my duty to God and the Queen and to keep the Brownie Guide law". At Brownies we play games from other countries or we do journey work which is doing badges and tests. I have done 2 badges. Journey work comes up about every two weeks. Last week we all went to a pageant at Widnes. I had to carry the flag for the 2nd Norley. Afterwards we wnt to a party in a very old bus.
